285 class irrad
286 {
287 protected:
288 
289  // Position inputs
290  double latitudeDegrees;
291  double longitudeDegrees;
292  double timezone;
293 
294  // Model settings
295  int skyModel;
296  int radiationMode;
297  int trackingMode;
298  bool enableBacktrack;
299 
300  // Time inputs
301  int year, month, day, hour;
302  double minute, delt;
303 
304  // Subarray properties
305  double tiltDegrees;
306  double surfaceAzimuthDegrees;
307  double rotationLimitDegrees;
308  double groundCoverageRatio;
309  poaDecompReq * poaAll;
310 
311  // Input Front-Side Irradiation components
312  double globalHorizontal;
313  double directNormal;
314  double diffuseHorizontal;
315  double weatherFilePOA;
316  double albedo;
317 
318  // Calculated Front-Side Irradiation components
319  double calculatedDirectNormal;
320  double calculatedDiffuseHorizontal;
321 
322  // Outputs
323  double sunAnglesRadians[9];
324  double surfaceAnglesRadians[5];
325  double planeOfArrayIrradianceFront[3];
326  double planeOfArrayIrradianceRear[3];
327  double diffuseIrradianceFront[3];
328  double diffuseIrradianceRear[3];
329  int timeStepSunPosition[3];
330  double planeOfArrayIrradianceRearAverage;
331 
332 public:
333 
335 #define IRRADPROC_NO_INTERPOLATE_SUNRISE_SUNSET (-1.0)
336 
338  static const int irradiationMax = 1500;
339 
341  irrad(weather_record wr, weather_header wh,
342  int skyModel, int radiationModeIn, int trackModeIn,
343  bool useWeatherFileAlbedo, bool instantaneousWeather, bool backtrackingEnabled,
344  double dtHour, double tiltDegrees, double azimuthDegrees, double trackerRotationLimitDegrees, double groundCoverageRatio,
345  std::vector<double> monthlyTiltDegrees, std::vector<double> userSpecifiedAlbedo,
346  poaDecompReq * poaAllIn);

374 
376  void set_global_diffuse(double global, double diffuse);

386

394  void get_sun( double *solazi,
395  double *solzen,

397  double *soldec,

400  int *sunup,

403  double *hextra );
404 
406  double get_sun_component(size_t i) { return sunAnglesRadians[i]; }
407

435  void getGroundShadeFactors(double rowToRow, double verticalHeight, double clearanceGround, double distanceBetweenRows, double horizontalLength, double solarAzimuthRadians, double solarElevationRadians, std::vector<int> & rearGroundFactors, std::vector<int> & frontGroundFactors, double & maxShadow, double & pvBackShadeFraction, double & pvFrontShadeFraction);
436 
438  void getGroundGHI(double transmissionFactor, std::vector<double> rearSkyConfigFactors, std::vector<double> frontSkyConfigFactors, std::vector<int> rearGroundShadeFactors, std::vector<int> frontGroundShadeFactors, std::vector<double> & rearGroundGHI, std::vector<double> & frontGroundGHI);
439 
441  void getBackSurfaceIrradiances(double pvBackShadeFraction, double rowToRow, double verticalHeight, double clearanceGround, double distanceBetweenRows, double horizontalLength, std::vector<double> rearGroundGHI, std::vector<double> frontGroundGHI, std::vector<double> frontReflected, std::vector<double> & rearIrradiance, double & rearAverageIrradiance);
442 
444  void getFrontSurfaceIrradiances(double pvBackShadeFraction, double rowToRow, double verticalHeight, double clearanceGround, double distanceBetweenRows, double horizontalLength, std::vector<double> frontGroundGHI, std::vector<double> & frontIrradiance, double & frontAverageIrradiance, std::vector<double> & frontReflected);
445 
446  enum RADMODE { DN_DF, DN_GH, GH_DF, POA_R, POA_P };
447  enum SKYMODEL { ISOTROPIC, HDKR, PEREZ };
448  enum TRACKING { FIXED_TILT, SINGLE_AXIS, TWO_AXIS, AZIMUTH_AXIS, SEASONAL_TILT };
449 
450 };
451 
452 // allow for the poa decomp model to take all daily POA measurements into consideration
453 struct poaDecompReq {
454  poaDecompReq() : i(0), dayStart(0), stepSize(1), stepScale('h'), doy(-1) {}
455  size_t i; // Current time index
456  size_t dayStart; // time index corresponding to the start of the current day
457  double stepSize;
458  char stepScale; // indicates whether time steps are hours (h) or minutes (m)
459  std::vector<double> POA; // Pointer to entire POA array (will have size 8760 if time step is 1 hour)
460  std::vector<double> inc; // Pointer to angle of incident array (same size as POA)
461  std::vector<double> tilt;
462  std::vector<double> zen;
463  std::vector<double> exTer;
464  double tDew;
465  int doy;
466  double elev;
467 };
468
